00010 class SharedMemoryBuffer {
00011 public:
00012     SharedMemoryBuffer()
00013         : info(0)
00014         , rdbMsg(0)
00015     {}
00016 
00017     ~SharedMemoryBuffer() {}
00018 
00019     RDB_SHM_BUFFER_INFO_t* info;
00020     RDB_MSG_t* rdbMsg;
00021 };
00022 
00023 typedef std::vector<SharedMemoryBuffer> SharedMemoryBufferList;
00024 typedef std::vector<RDB_MSG_t*> RdbMsgList;
00025 
00030 class SharedMemoryIO {
00031 
00032 public:
00033     SharedMemoryIO(SharedMemoryHandle shmHandle) ;
00034     ~SharedMemoryIO();
00035 
00041     bool createAndAttach(size_t size);
00042 
00047     bool attach();
00048 
00053     bool detach();
00054 
00059     bool destroy();
00060 
00065     inline bool isAttached() { return shm_.getStart() != 0; }
00066 
00071     unsigned int getNumberOfBuffers() const;
00072 
00077     SharedMemoryBufferList getBuffers();
00078 
00083     SharedMemoryBuffer getBufferInfo(unsigned int index);
00084 
00093     SharedMemoryBuffer getNextBuffer(unsigned int checkMask);
00094 
00102     SharedMemoryBuffer tryGetBuffer(unsigned int checkMask, uint16_t bufferId);
00103 
00109     inline bool clearBuffer(unsigned int index, bool force) { return rdbHandler_.shmBufferClear(index, force); }
00110 
00116     bool tryLockBuffer(RDB_SHM_BUFFER_INFO_t& buffer);
00117 
00122     inline void lockBuffer(RDB_SHM_BUFFER_INFO_t& buffer) { buffer.flags |= RDB_SHM_BUFFER_FLAG_LOCK; }
00123 
00128     inline void releaseBuffer(RDB_SHM_BUFFER_INFO_t& buffer) { buffer.flags &= ~RDB_SHM_BUFFER_FLAG_LOCK; }
00129 
00134     inline SharedMemoryHandle getShmHandle() const { return shm_.getHandle(); }
00135 
00140     inline size_t getShmSize() const { return shm_.getSize(); }
00141 
00142 private:
00143     Framework::RDBHandler rdbHandler_;  // use the RDBHandler helper routines to handle
00144     SharedMemory shm_;                  // shared memory abstraction class
00145 };
